story-moment.WORTHY OF THE HAMMER: His hammer and power stripped from him by Odin, Thor found himself in a small New Mexico town, where he proved he was worthy in a battle against the Destroyer.
story-moment.JOINING THE AVENGERS: After initial conflicts, Thor gained new comrades among the Avengers, taking part in the battle to defend New York from Loki and the Chitauri.
story-moment.DEFEATING MALEKITH: Thor defeated the Dark Elf, Malekith, on the heels of a struggle that sent them hurtling through the Nine Realms.
story-moment.FIGHTING HELA: On the heels of her taking his hammer, Thor lost an eye fighting the goddess of death, Hela.
story-moment.ACQUIRING STORMBREAKER: With a new weapon, the axe called Stormbreaker, Thor joined the fight in Wakanda against Thanos and his forces, with the fate of the universe at stake.

powers+abilities.SUMMONING MJOLNIR: Thor’s mighty hammer Mjolnir has immense destructive capabilities and can be summoned to Thor’s hand whenever the god of thunder wishes it.
powers+abilities.FLIGHT: By hurling Mjolnir while still holding on to the hammer, Thor is able to soar through the skies.
powers+abilities.GOD OF THUNDER: As the god of thunder, Thor – whether using Mjolnir to help harness his abilities or on his own – can bring forth thunder and lightning to use against his foes.
powers+abilities.STORMBREAKER & THE BIFROST: With Mjolnir destroyed, Thor received a new weapon, the axe, Stormbreaker. Like Mjolnir, it can help harness his powers, and is also capable of opening the Bifrost.
